original_text: And over the host of the tribe of the children of Manasseh was Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
korean_text: 므낫세 자손 지파의 군대는 브다술의 아들 가말리엘이 이끌었고

sentences.original_text: And over the host of the tribe
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 지파의 군대를 다스린 자는

sentences.original_text: was Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur
